title: Report: EU Investigating Visa and Mastercard for Potentially Harmful Fees
text: The European Commission has reportedly launched a probe into whether Mastercard and Visa's fees are hurting merchants. The commission sent out questionnaires to retailers and payment service providers about both Visa and Mastercard in September, giving them until October to respond, Reuters reported Wednesday (Nov. 6), citing an EU document it had seen.
